snippet.title: [Kohaku] Battle Preview
snippet.description:
[Kohaku] A trickster-type fighter with a long reach that allows her to control the battle flow, and she has a lot of freedom through her traps and attacks that come in waves.

"MELTY BLOOD: TYPE LUMINA" is coming to PlayStation®4, Nintendo Switch™, Xbox One, and Steam on Sept 30, 2021!
A new entry in the "MELTY BLOOD" series of 2D fighting games based on TYPE-MOON's visual novel "Tsukihime."

Official Twitter → https://twitter.com/MB_LUMINA/
Official website → https://meltyblood.typelumina.com/en/
